name: chart.streamgraph.js
description: A Streamgraph library and plug-in for chart.js

scripts.build:plugin: npm run concat:plugin && uglifyjs dst/Chart.Streamgraph.js > dst/Chart.Streamgraph.min.js
scripts.build:standalone: npm run concat:standalone && uglifyjs dst/Chart.Streamgraph.S.js > dst/Chart.Streamgraph.S.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:plugin & npm run build:standalone

author: Thomas Royal
